settings.title: WHAT BRUTE FORCE IS ALL ABOUT
settings.subheading: AND WHY WE DO WHAT WE DO

settings.title: LEARNING THE NEW SYSTEMS?
settings.subheading: Here's everything you need to know to get started

settings.text: Let's be real, stress isn't going away and science has proven that STRESS + REST= GROWTH, mentally, physically and emotionally. ULT™️ is one of the best methods to engage the Central Nervous System in a way that increase CNS response, Neuromuscular Connectivity & Adaptation and builds all the necessary connective tissue and stabilizing muscles critical to your longevity. We've designed our new systems to advance those aspects.

settings.subtitle: LET'S BEGIN
settings.title: THE NEW DESIGN
settings.text: Over the last year in studies, we have seen that slack and volume are just as important as weight when it comes to your bad, so we've created a filler system to ensure whether it's 15 or 75lbs, the bag provides the same level of unstable, shifting load.

settings.subtitle: ADAPTIVE INNOVATIONS
settings.title: RAPIDLY CHANGE YOUR WEIGHT
settings.text: Now for the first time ever, you can radpily modify the weight in your bag before, during or after your workouts. The design enables you to set your base weight in the primary filler, then easily modify by 5lbs increments at any time you choose.

Have the dimensions on the shell (bag) changed?

NO. They are all the same size, so any primary or adaptive filler may be used with a bag you currently own.

Can I continue to use sand?

ABSOLUTELY! We have created the new system but you can continue to use sand if you would like.

Do I need the adaptive fillers?

No. Only if you want the ability to change the weight without messing with the primary filler.

Can I add weight to the primary filler as I go?

Yes! We encourage you, as you progress to a new "base weight" simply dump one of your adaptive fillers and add 5lbs to your primary filler.

settings.subtitle: Now...
settings.title: BRING IT ALL TOGETHER
settings.text:
It's this easy...

STEP 1: CHOOSE YOUR BAG

STEP 2: CHOOSE YOUR BASE WEIGHT

STEP 3: ADD YOUR ADAPTIVE FILLERS

STEP 4: WORKOUT!

settings.title: MADE IN THE USA
settings.text: Every product is also tested and refined by some of the world’s toughest athletes our training center in Denver, CO.

settings.title: MILITARY SPEC
settings.text: Our products use the strongest materials including, 1000D Mil-Spec Cordura, Ballistic Nylon and YKK Zippers.

settings.title: WARRANTY
settings.text: All our items are backed by an accompanying repair / replace warranty for peace of mind.

settings.title: LEADERSHIP & INNOVATION
settings.text: Brute Force is a Veteran Owned and operated company with a tremendous background of innovation. Lead by Jeff Banman, Mo Brossette and Mark Divine from SEALFit, Brute Force is leading our community into a whole new realm of Human Performance & Optimization.

settings.subtitle: COMMUNITY MATTERS
settings.title: JOIN THE BRUTECREW
settings.text: Join thousands of athletes who train daily with the toughest equipment on the planet. Get access to benefits like BruteBUCKS, Our BruteWOD app & programming, special discounts, events a so much more!
